import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './sideBar.css'; import { AiOutlineInstagram } from 'react-icons/ai' import { AiOutlineLinkedin } from 'react-icons/ai' import { AiOutlineGithub } from 'react-icons/ai' import AppContext from './context/Context'; export default function Sidebar() { const linkedin = 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/rodrigo-paz-dev/' const instagram = 'https://www.instagram.com/rodrigopazlimas/' const github = 'https://github.com/rodrigopaaz' const {toggleMenu} = useContext(AppContext) const element = toggleMenu ? 'hidden' : 'flex'; return (
) }
